page.title: 07The Flower Show,Staverton
page.content: This is properly called the Staverton and Landscove Garden Show and Athletic Sports.A large marquee is erected on the Playing Field to house all the exhibits . The show is always the first Saturday in August and the exhibitors and judges are mostly from the surrounding towns.Apart from the wonderful vegetables ,fruit and flowers you can see many examples of local arts and craft.There is the sale of produce and side shows. About 600 people visit the show .The children especially enjoy the traditional races ;three-legged,sack,egg and spoon, slow bicycle, and potato besides the ordinary flat races.There is even a race like musical chairs for passenger and driver with the cars processing in a circle .When the music stops the girls rush for the nearest potato and 'thems without is out'
